text: "I'll Wait" is a 1984 song by Van Halen and is the second single from their sixth studio album 1984. It went to number 13 in the United States, number 85 in the United Kingdom and number 21 in Canada and there was no music video made for this single. ==Track listing== US 7" single UK 7" single/US 12" single == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Synth rock songs Category:Van Halen songs
title: I'll Wait
